channel.title: pattern on PO, Lead product Design at buzzvil
channel.description: Recent content in pattern on PO, Lead product Design at buzzvil

item.title: Head of Design @buzzvil
item.description: New start, new challenges, new life In Late 2014 I joined buzzvil as the lead designer, a dynamic startup based in Seoul. In June I was releasing my first Android and iOS Honeyscreen App with buzzvil. This is the beginning of a long story during which I’ve already learned so much! Work smarter, be lazier I don’t consider myself lazy per se, but I do enjoy a lot finding solutions to shorten boring, repetitive work.
